sentences.en: "Would your car be easy to steal?" — "Fat chance. I've got a device that shuts down the gas and ignition."
sentences.cn: “你的汽车容易被盗吗？”——“不太可能。有个装置，可关闭油门和点火开关。”

sentences.en: A sample so irradiated shows a somewhat lower ignition temperature.
sentences.cn: 这样照射后的试样,爆发点有所降低.

sentences.en: Hypergolic ignition systems bear many resemblances to hybrid rockets.
sentences.cn: 自然式点火系统在很多方面与混合型火箭相似.

sentences.en: I must have left my key in the ignition.
sentences.cn: 我肯定是把车钥匙忘在点火开关上了.

sentences.en: Metals are characterized by relatively high ignition temperatures.
sentences.cn: 金属的特点是较高的点燃温度.

sentences.en: Put the key in the ignition and turn it to start the car up.
sentences.cn: 将钥匙插进点火装置，然后转动钥匙发动汽车。

sentences.en: She got into the car and switched on the ignition.
sentences.cn: 她上车后点火发动汽车.

sentences.en: The device automatically disconnects the ignition when the engine is switched off.
sentences.cn: 当引擎关掉时，这个装置会自动切断点火开关。

sentences.en: The device automatically disconnects the ignition.
sentences.cn: 该装置使点火器自动断开。

sentences.en: The ignition - distributor vacuum - advance mechanism advances the spark during part - throttle operation.
sentences.cn: 分电器点火真空提前装置在节气门部分开启期间,使火花提前发出.

sentences.en: The ignition of methane gas killed eight men.
The ignition of the forest was caused by lightning.
sentences.cn: 森林起火是由雷电引起的.

sentences.en: The output peaks shortly after ignition.
sentences.cn: 引火后很快达到燃烧最高峰.

sentences.en: Three factors affect ignition, fuel vaporization, sparkplug location and spark energy.
sentences.cn: 影响点火的因素有三个, 即燃油的蒸发 、 火花塞的位置和火花能量.

words.tran_cn: 点火器；引爆装置；[电子] 引燃电极
[动力]点火，点燃；[热]着火，燃烧；点火开关，点火装置

phrases.tran_cn: 点火线圈；感应线圈；高压包
点火分电器；点火配电盘
点火系；点火系统；点火装置
点火正时；点火时间；点火定时蝶；点火调节器

trans.tran_cn: （汽油引擎的）发火装置，着火，燃烧，点火，点燃
trans.tran_en: the electrical part of a vehicle’s engine that makes it start working
